main event: Three observers reported seeing an orange glowing object in the sky near Selma, Alabama.
interesting points: Reports came from three different witnesses calling in to local officials,The object was observed moving in a straight line,One witness described it as a very small, bright, pale orange object,The investigating officer correlated the sightings with a B-52 aircraft seen nearby,The sightings lasted for about 15 minutes.
witness description: Three observers including a young lady and two male individuals
